label: Design ready
description: Sent when an ad group is marked as designed and ready for review.

label: Brief submitted
description: Sent when a brief is submitted for an ad group.

label: Review completed
description: Sent when review outcomes are recorded for an ad group.

label: Ad group blocked
description: Sent when an ad group is blocked and needs attention.

label: Overall feedback
description: Sent when overall feedback is submitted for an ad group.
